name: ticketprojekt
description: Root package to run backend and frontend together

scripts.build: npm run build:fe && npm run build:be && npm run bundle:static
scripts.bundle:static: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('frontend','dist');const dest=path.resolve('backend','public');fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Copied frontend/dist -> backend/public');"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BE,FE -c magenta,cyan "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.setup: npm ci --prefix backend && npm ci --prefix frontend
